answers.answer: Hi there,What hormonal imbalances do you have? It is suggested to continue the medications given by your doctor. Avoid stress as under stress, the body responds by increasing hormone production, including production of cortisol and adrenaline which can cause irregular periods, acne, excess body hair, high blood pressure, and diabetes etc.Maintain a healthy lifestyle and exercise daily. Take a balanced diet. It is suggested to consult your attending doctor and discuss your queries and concerns. Do write to me again.Best wishes and regards!

question: im trying for the baby since 2 or 3 months.i have a hormonal imbalance becuz of which my periods became irregular periods so she gave me medicines and told me for ovulation study.on the 11th day there were 2 eggs on my right ovary   which was 14.3 mm and 13.5 mm then on day 13 th there ws only 1 egg left measuring about 15 mm.its not develping properly.how will i get pregnant.plz help me out.
title: hope u ppl will understand and ans me
